name: Vairon's Wrath
description: Set out on a quest for revenge as Vairon, a young fearless warrior. Visit unique villages and memorable characters that will help or hinder Vairon on his journey. Experience an old school style adventure with varied gameplay where you will fight monsters, solve puzzles, and much more !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3.0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024*768 pixels ou résolution supérieur Storage: 430 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3.2 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1024*768 pixels ou résolution supérieur Storage: 430 MB available space
